text: The Far Eastern University – Institute of Tourism and Hotel Management or (ITHM) is one of the academic institutes that comprised Far Eastern University. It offers hospitality programs. == Degree Offerings == === Undergraduate Programs === * Bachelor of Science in Hotel and Restaurant Management (Culinary Management Track) * Bachelor of Science in Hotel and Restaurant Management (Hotel Operations Track) * Bachelor of Science in Tourism Management (Travel and Tours Management Track) * Bachelor of Science in Tourism Management (Events Management Track) == References == Category:Far Eastern University Category:Hospitality schools in the Philippines Category:Cooking schools in the Philippines
title: Far Eastern University Institute of Tourism and Hotel Management
